title: Why is it okay that 0-3-0 Yasuo can rush Phantom Dancer and still all-in my 2-0-1 Kennen?
body:
While Yasuo fails to avoid a single Shuriken and I have Hourglass components + Needlessly Large Rod.

This is really fucking stupid. Virtually every mobile melee champion gets a free win against Kennen once they reach a certain point, regardless of how badly they're playing or how behind they are.
